bibl.title: Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 2.2 (August 8, 2013).
bibl.note: Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by R. Ast, C. Balamoshev, R. Bagnall, L. Berkes, A. Boud'hors, W.G. Claytor, H. Cuvigny, U. Gad, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, J. Rea & L. Vanderheyden] that were adopted between December 13, 2012 and August 8, 2013. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
bibl.seg: Rodney Ast & James Cowey (edd.), Bulletin of Online Emendations to Papyri [BOEP]. Version 2.2 (August 8, 2013).
Heidelberg, Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg, Institut für Papyrologie, 2013, 2 pp.

Emendations appearing in this bulletin have been entered online at www.papyri.info/editor/ via the Papyrological Editor (PE), and have been vetted by members of the PE's editorial board. The list contains corrections [by R. Ast, C. Balamoshev, R. Bagnall, L. Berkes, A. Boud'hors, W.G. Claytor, H. Cuvigny, U. Gad, J. Gascou, N. Gonis, D. Hagedorn, P. Heilporn, J. Rea & L. Vanderheyden] that were adopted between December 13, 2012 and August 8, 2013. These emendations have not appeared previously in print and are presented together for ease of reference and review.
